verses.verse: Lo <S%H5869><s%>, mine eye hath <S%H7200>seen<s%> all <S%H241>this<s%>, Mine ear hath <S%H8085>heard<s%> and understood <S%H995>it<s%>.
What ye <S%H1847>know<s%>, the same do I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H5307>also<s%>: I am not inferior unto you.
Surely <S%H199><s%> I would <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>, And I <S%H2654>desire<s%> to <S%H3198>reason<s%> with <S%H410>God<s%>.
But <S%H199><s%> ye are <S%H2950>forgers<s%> of <S%H8267>lies<s%>; Ye are all <S%H7495>physicians<s%> of no <S%H457>value<s%>.
Oh <S%H5414>that<s%> ye would <S%H2790>altogether<s%> hold your <S%H2790>peace<s%>! And it would be your <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%> now my <S%H8433>reasoning<s%>, And <S%H7181>hearken<s%> to the <S%H7379>pleadings<s%> of my <S%H8193>lips<s%>.
Will ye <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H5766>unrighteously<s%> for <S%H410>God<s%>, And <S%H1696>talk<s%> deceitfully for <S%H7423>him<s%>?
Will ye <S%H5375>show<s%> <S%H6440>partiality<s%> to <S%H7378>him<s%>? Will ye contend for <S%H410>God<s%>?
Is it <S%H2895>good<s%> that he should search you <S%H2713>out<s%>? Or as <S%H582>one<s%> <S%H2048>deceiveth<s%> a <S%H2048>man<s%>, will ye deceive him?
He will <S%H3198>surely<s%> <S%H3198>reprove<s%> <S%H5643>you<s%>, If ye do secretly <S%H5375>show<s%> <S%H6440>partiality<s%>.
Shall not his <S%H7613>majesty<s%> make you <S%H1204>afraid<s%>, And his <S%H6343>dread<s%> fall upon <S%H5307>you<s%>?
Your <S%H2146>memorable<s%> sayings <S%H4912>are<s%> proverbs of <S%H665>ashes<s%>, Your <S%H1354>defences<s%> are <S%H1354>defences<s%> of <S%H2563>clay<s%>.
Hold your <S%H2790>peace<s%>, let me <S%H1696>alone<s%>, that I may speak; And let come on me what <S%H5674>will<s%>.
Wherefore should I <S%H5375>take<s%> my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in my <S%H8127>teeth<s%>, And <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%> in my <S%H3709>hand<s%>?
Behold <S%H2005><s%>, he will <S%H6991>slay<s%> <S%H3176>me<s%>; I have no hope: Nevertheless I will <S%H3198>maintain<s%> my <S%H1870>ways<s%> before <S%H6440>him<s%>.
This also shall be my <S%H3444>salvation<s%>, That a <S%H2611>godless<s%> man shall not <S%H935>come<s%> before <S%H6440>him<s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8085>diligently<s%> my <S%H4405>speech<s%>, And let my <S%H262>declaration<s%> be in your <S%H241>ears<s%>.
Behold <S%H6186>now<s%>, I have set my <S%H4941>cause<s%> in <S%H3045>order<s%>; I know that I am <S%H6663>righteous<s%>.
Who is he that will <S%H7378>contend<s%> with <S%H2790>me<s%>? For then would I hold my peace and give up the <S%H1478>ghost<s%>.
Only <S%H6213>do<s%> not <S%H8147>two<s%> things unto <S%H5641>me<s%>; Then will I not hide myself from thy <S%H6440>face<s%>:
Withdraw <S%H7368><s%> thy <S%H3709>hand<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H367>me<s%>; And let not thy terror make me <S%H1204>afraid<s%>.
Then <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H6030>thou<s%>, and I will answer; Or let me <S%H1696>speak<s%>, and answer thou <S%H7725>me<s%>.
How many are mine <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> and <S%H2403>sins<s%>? Make me to <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H6588>transgression<s%> and my <S%H2403>sin<s%>.
Wherefore <S%H5641>hidest<s%> thou thy <S%H6440>face<s%>, And <S%H2803>holdest<s%> me for thine <S%H341>enemy<s%>?
Wilt thou <S%H6206>harass<s%> a <S%H5086>driven<s%> <S%H5929>leaf<s%>? And wilt thou <S%H7291>pursue<s%> the <S%H3002>dry<s%> <S%H7179>stubble<s%>?
For thou <S%H3789>writest<s%> bitter <S%H4846>things<s%> against <S%H3423>me<s%>, And makest me to inherit the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of my <S%H5271>youth<s%>:

Thou <S%H7760>puttest<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> also in the <S%H5465>stocks<s%>, And <S%H8104>markest<s%> all my <S%H734>paths<s%>; Thou settest a <S%H2707>bound<s%> to the <S%H8328>soles<s%> of my <S%H7272>feet<s%>:
Though I am like a rotten <S%H7538>thing<s%> that <S%H1086>consumeth<s%>, Like a <S%H899>garment<s%> that is <S%H6211>moth<s%> - <S%H398>eaten<s%>.
